(7451x243+287)/64 mod 1024 = 647. (7451x729+925)/128 mod 512 = 459. (7451x2187+2903)/256 mod 256 = 177. (7451x6561+8965)/512 mod 128 = 10. (7451x6561+8965)/1024 mod 64 = 5. (7451x19683+27919)/2048 mod 32 = 8. (7451x19683+27919)/4096 mod 16 = 4. (7451x19683+27919)/8192 mod 8 = 2. (7451x19683+27919)/16384 mod 4 = 1. (7451x59049+100141)/32768 mod 2 = 0. (7451x59049+100141)/65536 mod 1 = 0.
